tool_description: Free feed with IOCs - malicious URLs, domains, IPs, and hashes. [Website: https://tweetfeed.live]

api_list.name: v1
api_list.description: Version 1 Endpoint for retrieving malicious indicators of compromise (IOCs) based on specified timeframes and filters.

required_parameters.name: time
required_parameters.description: Select one of these timeframes: **today** - Today starting 00:00 UTC, **week** - Last 7 days, **month** - Last 30 days, **year** - Last 365 days.

optional_parameters.name: filter1
optional_parameters.description: Can be a specific user, type, or tag. Type options include **url**, **domain**, **ip**, **sha256**, **md5**. Tag options include **phishing**, **ransomware**, **CobaltStrike**, etc. User options include **@malwrhunterteam**, **@1ZRR4H**, **@MBThreatIntel**, etc. (include the @ symbol).

optional_parameters.name: filter2
optional_parameters.description: Can be a specific user, type, or tag. Type options include **url**, **domain**, **ip**, **sha256**, **md5**. Tag options include **phishing**, **ransomware**, **CobaltStrike**, etc. User options include **@malwrhunterteam**, **@1ZRR4H**, **@MBThreatIntel**, etc. (include the @ symbol).
